wikipedia_page.main: Fred Ewen Gillies Macaulay (1 January 1925 — 15 February 2003) was a Gaelic scholar and radio producer who was head of the BBC Gaelic department for 19 years, and oversaw a tenfold increase of Gaelic broadcasting time.

response: * Fred Macaulay (1925–2003), BBC broadcaster, and former manager from 1980-83 of BBC Radio Highland
